item.title: Supreme Court Will Not Issue Ruling On Trump Tariffs Today: Hassett Reportedly Says White House Could Use Alternatives To Get To The 'Same Place'
item.description: In an interview with CNBC on Friday, Hassett stated the White House expects to win, but it is ready in case of an adverse ruling.

item.title: From Bioterrorism To Job Losses: Bill Gates Says Real AI Risks Will Hit Sooner Than Most People Expect
item.description: In a blog post, Gates said there is no upper limit to how intelligent AI technology can become or how good robots will become.

item.title: MLTX Stock Extends Rally As FDA Feedback Spurs Bullish Brokerage Action – Retail Speculates On Potential M&A Conversations

item.title: Goldman Sachs Trims Netflix Price Target Ahead Of Earnings – The New Level Still Leaves A Good Upside Potential
item.description: Goldman Sachs expressed concern about Netflix prioritizing content-related acquisitions from Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) over organic expansion.
